name: 7 Mages
summary: The epic RPG 7 Mages in the tradition of the greatest classics of the genre takes you around the magical island of Roven.

name: 7: Molmorth no Kiheitai
summary:
Trouble is in the land of Acralind. Thousand years ago, seven legendary heroes have sealed the powers of evil with seven sacred stones. But now, the stones have been weakened, and the ancient evil raises its head again. Monsters attack villages and towns. It is your task to retrieve the seven stones and to restore peace in the land.

In this strategy RPG, the emphasis is on preparation for the battles rather than on the battles themselves. Before each battle, you are able to see the stats of the monsters and even the tactics they are going to use. You must then select seven units of various classes (knights, archers, mages, etc.) and place them on a battle field, which is a grid composed of four columns and three rows. Front row can attack, middle row support or attack with bows, and back row heals. The battle itself is controlled by computer AI, but you can change formation at any time.

name: 7-minute HOP
summary:
Let's help this cute alien to get as high as possible! Cool classic game with casual gameplay. 
Game Features: 
- Casual gameplay like a classic jump-to-play game! 
- Attractive graphics 
- Infinite gameplay 
- Get as high as you can

name: 7 Meters Away: Oscar and the Cell of the Soul
summary: "7 Meters Away. Óscar and the Cell of the Soul" is a point and click game in which you must help Óscar escape from a mysterious cell by solving various puzzles to discover why he has been imprisoned before it's too late.

name: 7 Minutes in Hell
summary: 7 Minutes in Hell is an intense, co-operative horror game, where 1-4 contestants must face high-stakes challenges! In this thrilling gameshow experience, work together to hunt for loot and internet fame, while escaping from monsters, traps, and obstacles, before your 7 minutes are up!
